import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Product,listProducts } from '../../../model/Product' import Model from '../Modal/Model' import ProductItem from '../product/ProductItem' import './Reset.css' export default function TableProduct() { const [listProduct, setListProduct] = useState(listProducts) const [edit, setEdit] = useState({ id: '', name: '', image: '', price: 1 }) const onDelete = (id: string): void => { let tam = (listProduct.filter(item => item.id != id)) setListProduct(tam) } return (
{listProduct.map((item,index)=> )}
ID Image Name Price Xóa Sửa
) }
